attributes.action: Scrap the new road layout on the M25 anticlockwise carriageway at junction 19.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THE campaign to end "ludicrous" lane alterations at a motorway junction.
Drivers fed up with increasing congestion are calling on the Highways Agency to scrap changes recently made to the M25 at junction 19.
Many contend that these changes have turned several roads in Watford into fume-filled carparks as motorists attempt to avoid junction 19.
The controversial scheme introduced in February, saw the Highways Agency reduce the entry slip road at Hunton Bridge.
It now wants to make the reduction permanent.

However, local politicians say this improvement has been at the expense of congestion on local roads.
Councillors from Watford Borough Council, Hertfordshire County Council and Three Rivers District Council have demanded the trial end.
